metadata.title: CVE-2023-49343 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Temporary data passed between application components by Budgie ExtrasDropby applet could potentially be viewed or manipulated. The data isstored in a location that is accessible to any user who has local access tothe system. Attackers may pre-create and control this file to present falseinformation to users or deny access to the application and panel.

criterions.comment: budgie-extras package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
